price: 12. Adeeca Allaah, adeecana Rasuulka, haddaadse jeesataan (Xaqa diiddaan), waxaa saaran Rasuulkayaga oo keliya Gaarsiin Cad.
arabic: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla fa-in tawallaytum fa-innamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
